cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7496, a bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to install a plaque at the peak of Ram Head in the Virgin Islands National Park on St. John, United States Virgin Islands, to commemorate the slave rebellion that began on St. John in 1733

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 63 (Monday, April 11, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. PLASKETT:
H.R. 7496.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H4438]
title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to install a plaque at the peak of Ram Head in the Virgin Islands National Park on St. John, United States Virgin Islands, to commemorate the slave rebellion that began on St. John in 1733.
